name: Achievement Simulator 2018
description:
Meet another masterpiece from the developer of the legendary SUDOKU!

Feel yourself in the shoes of a real hunter for achievements in Steam!
Achievement Simulator 2018 is a minimalistic clicker where you need to open a hundred incredibly beautiful achievements.

FEATURES:

- Incredible gameplay, following the latest trends in the gaming market!
- 100 eye-pleasing achievements with which you can decorate your profile!
- Pleasant soundtrack!
- There are achievements with cats!
